I mean, it's only a real-time tactical stealth game set in a cursed 18th century Jesuit monastery, developed by the people behind gorgeously gross metroidvania Blasphemous. It's only got isometric art inspired by Goya and a sanity/trauma system redolent of Darkest Dungeon. Sounds like an automatic RPS write-up to me. 
 Read more
articles.title: The Blasphemous dev's new Goya-fuelled stealth tactics monastery sim is basically Umberto Eco's The Great Escape

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Remember that puzzle game Unravel and its star: a cute lad made of yarn called Yarny? He'd tackle headscratchers by unwinding the very fabric of his body, similar to how a human being might feed their intestines through a karabiner and use it as a tether for a spot of rock climbing. Well, some of the minds behind Unravel are working on new game called Hela. This time it's less about yarn and more about being a small mouse who does parkour. Still, it does retain some of the bodily gymnastics of its predecessor. Namely the use of tongues as bungee ropes.
Read more
articles.title: Former Unravel devs announce Scandinavian parkour mouse sim where you can walk on tongues

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
I've yet to discover a SteamWorld game I don't like. Whether plundering the earth in SteamWorld Dig 2 or mucking about with magic in SteamWorld Quest, these are solid and approachable adventures that enthusiastically embrace whatever theme the developers have decided upon. Cowboys? Sure. Wizards? Why not. It barely matters, as long as it results in some good puns. As a studio, Thunderful have a reputation for hopping from one style of game to the next, boiling entire genres down to their essence, and reconstituting them with competence and style to exist within a now-familiar steampunk world of colourful pals and Saturday morning cartoon jokes. The studio is a perpetual notion machine. Yes, with SteamWorld Heist 2, they're revisiting the sci-fi bullet-bouncing of their 2016 tactics game SteamWorld Heist, but they're also introducing significant changes to create a compulsive XCOM-like full of sea-faring submariners that may be their best work yet, even against a back catalogue of blinders. 
Read more
articles.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 review: a tactical trick shot across the bow of lesser strategy games

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
If you're feeling very rested and at peace today, I do not recommend you play the demo for just-announced puzzle game Wilmot Works It Out. It will relax you so much that you gently petrify. Future archaeologists will marvel at you, a smiling stone figure in the ruins of a bygone civilisation. "What exactly was going on back in 2024 to inspire such a critical intensity of chillax?" they will wonder. Then, they will spot the computer screen glowing beneath its layer of dust, and the cycle will begin anew.
 Read more
articles.title: Wilmot Works It Out is the picture puzzle sequel to the wonderful warehouse sim - here's a demo

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Sorry everyone, I might have to start doing that Token RPS Starfield Liker thing again. The Shattered Space expansion, out on September 30th, probably won’t refurbish the RPG’s reputation as an overall miss – but it does ditch the proc-gen planet bloat for a single handcrafted hellhole, a true Bethesda speciality honed by years of Fallouts and Elder Scrollseses. And, if its - sadly hands-off - Gamescom showcase is any indication, it might just double down on Starfield’s own strengths as well.
Read more
articles.title: Starfield: Shattered Space looks like a wise return to Bethesda basics

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
We’ve apparently never written about Atomfall, an oversight I’m now all too happy to correct, having played a promising forty minutes or so at Gamescom 2024. In development at Sniper Elite makers Rebellion, it’s a "survival-action game inspired by real-life events" – specifically the Windscale fire, which in 1957 coated much of northern England in radioactive fallout. Atomfall’s alternative history makes Britain’s worst nuclear disaster even more disastrous, plunging the realm into full-on post-apocalyptica and leaving your good amnesiac self to dodge death with nothing but a cricket bat and whatever you can scrounge out of sheds. I like it! Mostly.
Read more
articles.title: Atomfall plays like a S.T.A.L.K.E.R. with Scouse accents

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I've never really understood the charm of ultrawide monitors. I dare boldly to maintain that there is such a thing as Too Wide, a point beyond which the extra visual estate becomes a waste of electricity, unless you watch the screen in pairs. I can only assume people who use ultrawide monitors live in constant terror of flanking manoeuvres and demand the maximum amount of peripheral vision. Mind you, I tend to play games with my nose about 10 centimetres from the screen. Forget being flanked - it's the prospect of snipers up ahead I'm worried about.
If you're among the people who fret excessively about flankers, I've got great news from Uncle BioWare. Forthcoming RPG Dragon Age: The Veilguard will support 21:9 ultrawide monitors. The ultrawide functionality extends to cinematics - you can disable "cinematic aspect ratios" to switch off the black bars that otherwise hem in the view. It's one of several PC-specific flourishes they've just blogged about. Have a look.
 Read more
articles.title: BioWare detail Dragon Age: The Veilguard's PC-specific graphics features and controller options

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Gamescom is exploding all around us, but there is still time to lower a pincer into the pile of Steam indie game announcements and reel up the occasional treasure. In this case, it's the demo for Cupiclaw, which is possibly the first ever "roguelike deckbuilding claw machine game". You know how Balatro made you feel about Joker cards? Well, this game wants to make you feel the same about claw machines. It's a terrible turn of events, frankly. I'm sorry for inflicting yet another potential bingeplay upon you. Here's a trailer. 
Read more
articles.title: Cupiclaw wants to do for claw machines what Balatro did for poker

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Our James recently stormed off to Cologne after having one too many kills stolen by Edwin in Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. “I’m never even going to look at another videogame again!”, he declared. Unfortunately for James, he accidentally walked straight into Gamescom. “I’m starting to think that there are a lot of video games” he informed us yesterday. Horrifying if true. Still, it does sound like he’s managing to have some fun there, mainly by hitting up Saber Interactive COO and former id Software co-owner Tim Willits for some top tips on how to avenge Edwin’s thieving ways.
Tips about kill-stealing aside, James found time to ask Willits about Space Marine 2's microtransactions, and whether there was any nervousness returning to a cult hit series… especially one a lot of people had almost given up on ever seeing again. “Even the “push forward” combat of the original was part of [id’s] inspiration when we created Doom 2016,” answered Willits. “So for me personally, it’s this huge circle. It’s always intimidating working on a franchise that people love.” But, with the right team, technology, and vision he says, “it just comes together.”
Read more
articles.title: Saber boss explains Space Marine 2's microtransactions: “People don’t want to be sold horse armour anymore"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I genuinely don't like sucker-punching video games the second they're announced, but playing Glowmade's King Of Meat is three hours of my life I won't get back, and every second I spend writing about it extends that total, dragging me closer to a regretful demise. Here's the stuff I'm more positive about: buried at the core of this spurting interactive snarkfest there is a moderately OK third-person dungeon-crawler for groups of up to four.
Read more
articles.title: Dire comedy bloodsport King Of Meat should have been called King Of Meme

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Now, I never played quite as much as our Brendy did of the original Splitgate. But I had a fun time with its mixture of Halo-esque trigger pulling and portalling around! So I was intrigued to give the alpha version of Splitgate 2 a go and see if it had a little more substance to it than its initial reveal, which gave off a, "it's Splitgate but with more money" feel. 
Well, I think it's… a bit serious? It certainly has more polish and some extra additions, yet I didn't come away from it thrilled by its more competitive, class-based FPS leanings. I think it just needs a bit more time, perhaps, for a portal to open and some silly rocket launchers and baseball bats and zombies to come tumbling out of it.
Read more
articles.title: Splitgate 2 remains a portal-hopping FPS delight, but it really needs to lighten up

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Marvel Rivals, Netease' free-to-play Overwatch wannabe comprised of superheroes from the Marvelverse, is set to launch on December 6th. And in a "hah, take this Overwatch!" way, they've also announced that all of its heroes will be unlocked for everyone straight off the bat (man). Oh no wait, he's DC isn't he. To be fair, I've only watched one Avengers film, two Captain Americas, and Thor: Ragnarok (without seeing the other Thors). All of which I have zero recollection of. Anyway, yes, Marvel Rivals.
Read more
articles.title: Netease gloatingly note that Overwatch-like Marvel Rivals won't make you unlock heroes, unlike Overwatch 2

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
If you have experience of the London rental market, there's only one way you can react to a game – a French game, no less, the product of a country where two-bed apartments apparently grow on trees – that promises to maroon you in a sprawling labyrinth of flats. “Haha, alright for some!” you chortle despairingly, after freeing yourself from the laundry basket and retrieving your trousers from the fridge. “I bet labyrinths have more than one window,” you sob, as you yet again tackle the problem of opening the front door without becoming part of the wall. 
If you have have experience of the London rental market, you are probably reading this and thinking: “He’s got a front door? Such extravagance. I live in a folded umbrella.” Touché, my friend. I guess it’s just as well we have spaciously proportioned first-person puzzle adventures to console us in our time of compound elbow bruises, rising damp and preposterous financial debt. On which note, Looking For Fael seems fun. 
 Read more
articles.title: In first-person Myst-alike Looking For Fael you’re stuck in a surreal apartment maze, but you do get a Game Boy Advance SP

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Lo, a ripple in the release date sands. Stand still a moment while we study this phenomenon. Yes, yes, it is the unmistakable rumble of a large survival MMO pondering its release date. Dune: Awakening is having a think and has decided "early 2025" is a good non-specific time period to come out in early access. That could mean January or February. Or March, I guess. April? Now don't be silly, that's spring. Not April, surely. This beast seems hungry. It will eat before then. I have foreseen it. Mostly by watching the trailer that dropped at Gamescom.
Read more
articles.title: Dune Awakening will burst out of the early access sands in "early 2025"

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 has been delayed yet again, pushing the troubled RPG into the first half of 2025. Publishers Paradox Interactive and developers The Chinese Room say the delay will allow them to continue to polish the game, respond to feedback, and expand on its story.

 
Read more
articles.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 has been delayed again, this time until the first half of 2025

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Arc Raiders was announced back in 2021 as a free-to-play co-op third-person shooter, and has been delayed several times since. That's partly because Embark Studios' other in-development game, The Finals, progressed faster than planned and stole its momentum. It's also because it was re-tooled at some point as a PvPvE extraction shooter.

Now it's back again, aiming for release next year, and it's been re-tooled a little more: it's no longer free-to-play.

 
Read more
articles.title: Arc Raiders, extraction shooter from The Finals' devs, is no longer free-to-play and coming 2025

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Here's the news: there's a new Mafia game, it's called Mafia: The Old Country, and it's set in 20th century Sicily rather than in America as per the previous three games in the series.

That's about all we know, but hop below and you'll find a trailer.

 
Read more
articles.title: Mafia: The Old Country coming in 2025, taking the series to early 20th century Sicily

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Oh, and new Indiana Jones And The Great Circle trailer! Great. I’ve been looking forward to a nice, juicy chunk of extended gameplay. You know, something to really convey the flow of the game, rather than the admittedly impressive but nonetheless very fragmented snippets we’ve gotten so far. Now to sit back and…oh, wait. Hang on. It’s just actor Troy Baker telling me about all the great acting he’ll be doing. It is great, by the way. He’s doing a fantastic job. Maybe just, you know, a crumb of acknowledgement or elucidation over the whole ‘interactivity’ part?
Anyway, don’t mind me. I’m just an old fool who likes to press buttons. And, to be fair, it's not like Machinegames don't have a great track record. Anyway, here’s some good news: The game releases December 9th this year. Have a release date trailer.
Read more
articles.title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle releases December 9th, will hopefully contain gameplay by that point

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Little Nightmares DNA runs strong in Tarsier Studios’ new game. So much so, in fact, that I’d assumed the trailer I watched during an online preview event last week was for a new entry in the horror cinematic-platformer series, right up until the name Reanimal appeared on the screen - shortly followed by a snippet of voiced dialogue.
It’s not just the horror setting, but the Grimm’s fairytale threat, the distorted adults-made-monsters through the trauma-tinged lens of a child’s imagination. A long-limbed man riding a bicycle in a threadbare suit chases children down an alley. A gangly, bowler-hatted pursuer scuttles down a long table like a spider. It's familiar enough territory, at least at first glance. But when Tarsier have a body of work subconsciously scarred by phantasms this vivid, recurring nightmares are just as potent.
Read more
articles.title: Little Nightmare studio’s Reanimal is a creepy co-op adventure inspired by Wind Waker and Silent Hill 2

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
There are unexpected things in life, like when one of the recipes in my Gousto box (basically Hello Fresh) didn't come packed with a key ingredient: a single red pepper. Devastating, especially since it's only ever happened to me once. Anyway, this is a long but no less meaningful segue to a game from the Far: Changing Tides and Lone Sails devs Okomotive that's just been announced at this year's Geoffcom show. It's called Herdling and it's nothing to do with sailing across a decaying universe, but very much to do with alpine expeditions and friendly beasts. Very unexpected.
Read more
articles.title: Herdling sees you guide some loveable beasts towards a mysterious summit

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
MachineGames have made a decent living as the creators of satirical alternate histories in which you messily murder Nazis using mighty double-handfuls of shotgun. There are Nazis to fight in Indiana Jones And The Great Circle - a globe-trotting, tomb-robbing adventure featuring a Lost Ark-era Harrison Ford - but as you'd expect from a Lucasfilm adaptation, there's rather less of the bloodshed. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle is both a more "relaxed" Wolfenstein and Riddick plus Nazis

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Peter Molyneux is once again back from the beyond, and he's making a new god sim. The game in question is Masters Of Albion, which now has a page on Steam. In development at Molyneux's 2012-founded studio 22cans, it looks like a mix of Populous and Black & White with knocked-together, toylike visuals, and a loose tower-defence format whereby monsters attack your villages at night. Here's the first trailer.
 Read more
articles.title: Peter Molyneux is back with new god sim Masters Of Albion, which looks like a stripped-down Black & White

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Ke zobrazení textové informace je potřeba písmo. Jeho volba významně ovlivňuje čitelnost textu a má velký dopad na uživatelský zážitek. Pojďme se podívat, jaké máme v písmech možnosti, jak je využívat, co dělat a čemu se naopak vyhnout.
articles.title: Písma a jejich použití: od beden s odlitky ke stažení souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ještě jednou se vrátíme k modelu pro lineární regresi. S ním jsme se již setkali, ovšem ve skutečnosti je i zdánlivě jednoduchý koncept lineární regrese realizován tak, že ho lze využít mnoha dalšími způsoby.
articles.title: Scikit-learn: jednoduchý a současně i univerzální model lineární regrese

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Ondřej Surý)
articles.description: Nová verze DNS serveru BIND 9.20.0 přináší významná vylepšení po dvou letech vývoje. Klíčové novinky zahrnují nové aplikační a databázové jádro, optimalizovanou podporu DNSSEC a vylepšenou kompresi DNS jmen.
articles.title: BIND 9.20: vylepšený výkon resolveru a nové databázové a aplikační jádro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se podíváme na SQL klienta, budeme zkoumat elementy testovaných aplikací a nakonec si zaznamenáme čas strávený na projektech.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (4. 9. 2024): mějte své databáze pevně v rukou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Grafické karty EGA a VGA byly postaveny na konceptu takzvaných bitových rovin. To si vyžádalo podporu různých čtecích a zápisových režimů, jež sice komplikovaly programování, ovšem přinesly velmi rychlé přenosy v rámci video RAM.
articles.title: Skrytá síla karty VGA: čtecí a zápisové režimy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Monika Kutějová)
articles.description: Podíváme se na zneužití chyb v prohlížečích Chrome a Safari, botnetové útoky skrze IP kamery, quishingovou kampaň využívající Microsoft Sway a nové útoky čínské skupiny Volt Typhoon.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: chyby v prohlížečích a nová quishingová kampaň

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: ElasticSearch a Kibana jsou znovu k dispozici pod open-source licencí. Aktualizace od společnosti Microsoft narušila nastavení dualbootu pro uživatele Linuxu na počítačích, kde byl povolen Secure Boot.
articles.title: Aktualizace Microsoftu narušila spouštění Linuxu, Kibana je znovu open source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Šest týdnů do uvedení Plasmy 6.2, známe poslední novinky, Microsoft vylepšuje D3D12 akceleraci videa v Mesa, VKD3D 1.13 též vylepšuje Direct3D 12 API nad Vulkanem, QR kernel panic postavený na Rustu.
articles.title: Kernel panic s QR v Linuxu 6.12, neshody Rust vývojářů se správci částí jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vrtal mi hlavou tripple buffering v KDE i GNOME a jeho vliv na plynulost desktopu se starými CPU+GPU Intel. Nakonec mě toto téma dovedlo k přesvědčení, které shrnuje název dnešního povídání.
articles.title: Čtyřjádrový procesor už na linuxový desktop přestává stačit

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Budeme se zabývat důležitou problematikou, konkrétně jak vybrat co nejvhodnější model, jak nastavit hyperparametry modelů a jak vlastně zjistit, které atributy se mají použít při tréninku modelu.
articles.title: Křížová validace modelů v knihovně scikit-learn

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Google oznámil, že zdrojový kód systému Android 15 byl uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source Project (AOSP). Pro telefony Pixel by přitom systém byl měl být vydán během několika následujících týdnů. Ostatní výrobci na svá zařízení dostanou Android 15 v řádu měsíců. Nyní mohou na portaci začít také tvůrci alternativních ROM.
articles.title: Android 15 uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Pytelka)
articles.description: Tým věnující se projektu Bugzilla připravil po pěti letech novou stabilní verzi 5.2. Současně pokračuje vývoj budoucí verze 6 (projekt Harmony), společně byla vydána verze 5.9.1 - Developer Preview Release.
articles.title: Vyšla Bugzilla 5.2 a 5.91

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Otevřený firmware Coreboot v nové verzi 24.08 podporuje tři desítky dalších desek, kde mezi těmi uživatelsky běžně kupovanými najdeme ASRock Fatal1ty Z87 Professional, Z87E-ITX, Z87M OC Formula, Z97E-ITX/ac či Gigabyte GA-H61M-S2P-R3 a notebook HP EliteBook 8560w. Celkově více než 900 patchů od více než 130 vývojářů stojí i za opravou řady chyb.
articles.title: Coreboot 24.08 přidává 31 základních desek a počáteční podporu Intel Panther Lake

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Příslušný Wayland protokol xx-color-management-v4 pro správu barev (color management) je již součástí kandidáta na vydání ostré verze kompozitoru GNOME Mutter 47. Shrnuje řadu pull requestů implementujícíh podporu pro barevné prostory sRGB a PQ+Bt.2020 (Perceptual Quantize).
articles.title: GNOME Mutter 47 přinese správu barev na Waylandu a opravu EGLDevice pro starší GeForce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Zatímco s JPEG XL se Google moc nezabývá, AVIF má u něj stále lépe a lépe ustláno. Po jinak běžně Googlem podporovaném formátu WebP, odvozeném od videa WebM, tedy komprese VP8/VP9, nyní do vyhledávání Googlu nyní přibývá podpora obrázků ve formátu AVIF.
articles.title: Google přidává podporu AVIF do vyhledávání

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byla objevena zranitelnost v kryptografické knihovně společnosti Infineon, která se používá v zařízeních YubiKey řady 5 a Security Key Series s firmwarem před verzí 5.7.0 a YubiHSM 2 s firmwarem před verzí 2.4.0. Společnost Yubico potvrdila dopad na její bezpečnostní tokeny, závažnost ohodnotila stupněm střední.
articles.title: Chyba v knihovně Infineon ohrožuje soukromé klíče z tokenů YubiKey a dalších zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: VPN umožňuje bezpečně propojit různá zařízení pomocí šifrovaných tunelů. Umožňuje také zapojit uživatele do vnitřní sítě přes zabezpečený přístupový bod. Na školení si prakticky ukážeme, jak to celé nastavit a zprovoznit pomocí nejnovějšího protokolu WireGuard.
articles.title: WireGuard: nasazujeme VPN rychle a jednoduše (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Ač to podle počasí nevypadá, prázdniny skončily. Nesmutněte však, neboť již tento čtvrtek bude Virtuální Bastlírna - setkání elektroniků, bastlířů, ajťáků a všech milovníků techniky! Jaké novinky a témata tam čekají?
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 42: nový mikrokontrolér od Raspberry Pi Foundation

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vývojáři Intelu svižně dokončují podporu druhé velké generace svých GPU. Pod názvem Battlemage se snad skutečně objeví plnohodnotné grafické karty, ne jen integrovaná jádra (ač o tom stále kromě neoficiálních zvěstí nemáme informace), nicméně dále vyvíjená podpora v Linuxu a projektech souvisejících naznačuje, že tento projekt Intel k ledu nedal.
articles.title: Podpora pro Intel Battlemage v Linuxu 6.12 a Mesa 24.3 finišuje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Mnoho novinek ve Firefoxu 130 věru co do počtu není, ale dvě z nich potěší našince z Česka i Slovenska. Firefox 130 přináší podporu překladů dílčích částí webových stránek, které již samy jako celek byly přeloženy. V překladech ve Firefoxu pak mezi novými 11 jazyky nalezneme i češtinu a slovenštinu. Mozilla zde nijak, na rozdíl od jiných, nesleduje, co si uživatel nechává přeložit.
articles.title: Firefox 130 vylepšuje překlady stránek, nově umí i češtinu a slovenštinu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Rawtherapee 5.11 je už více než týden venku a konečně se z domovského webu projektu dozvídáme soupis novinek. Mezi nimi nechybí například přechod na skutečný HiDPI režim zobrazení (kde je potřeba), nastavitelnou hodnotu maximálního zoomu v editoru, možnost nechat si při prohlížení fotek zobrazit v daném adresáři i jeho podadresáře.
articles.title: Rawtherapee 5.11 přechází na libraw a přináší vylepšení prakticky ve všech nástrojích

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Play Store na Androidu byl doposud při aktualizaci více aplikací pomalý. Aktualizoval aplikace po jedné, vždy čekal, až se předchozí aplikace stáhne a nainstaluje.
articles.title: Play Store na Androidu bude nyní aktualizovat až tři aplikace současně

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Téměř před rokem se v jádře 6.8 objevil první ovladač napsaný v Rustu. Šlo o síťovou kartu Asix AX88796B. Do jádra 6.12 se chystá další ovladač a je to opět síťová karta.
articles.title: Další síťová karta bude mít jaderný ovladač v Rustu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Žebříčků populárnosti programovacích jazyků existuje spousta. Server ZDNET vytvořil svůj žebříček tak, že dal dohromady výsledky devíti známých indexů. Jsou tu tři Stack Overflow, tři IEEE, PYPL, Tiobe a GitHub.
articles.title: Nejpopulárnější programovací jazyky podle ZDNET: Python, JavaScript a Java

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Proxmox je moderní virtualizační platforma, která v mnoha případech může nahradit VMware. Je open-source, zdarma a je postaven na otevřených technologiích jako KVM, LXC, CEPH a dalších. Pokud potřebujete provozovat virtualizaci, Proxmox je pro vás ideální stack a na našem workshopu Proxmox se dozvíte, jak na něj.
articles.title: Proxmox: moderní virtualizační platforma schopná nahradit VMware (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V roce 2021 byly vyhledávací nástroj ElasticSearch a vizualizační platforma Kibana přelicencovány pod nesvobodnou licencí SSPL (Server Side Public License). Nyní společnost Elastic oznámila, že tyto projekty budou distribuovatelné také pod licencí Affero GPL.
articles.title: ElasticSearch a Kibana se opět stávají svobodným softwarem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Světoznámý zpravodajský web AnandTech oznámil, že po 27 letech ukončil svou činnost. Web, který v roce 1997 začal jako technologický blog jednoho mladého nadšence, se postupem času stal jedním z nejznámějších médií zaměřených na počítačové komponenty. Přinášel mnoho velmi podrobných recenzí a užitečných technických informací.
articles.title: Zpravodajský server AnandTech po 27 letech končí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři konference LinuxDays ukončil veřejné přihlašování přednášek. Teď je na vás, abyste vybrali nejlepší témata. Hlasovat můžete do pondělí 9. září. Poté podle výsledků hlasování organizátoři sestaví program pro letošní ročník.
articles.title: Hlasujte o tématech pro letošní ročník LinuxDays

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Adam)
articles.description: MikroTik na svém youtubovém kanále a na fóru oznámil první veřejnou betaverzi administrační aplikace pro routery WinBox 4. Aplikace je určená pro konfiguraci routerů a switchů se systémem RouterOS. Hlavní novinkou je především nativní podpora UI pro systémy Windows, Linux a macOS, na kterou se dle článku na fóru čekalo 15 let.
articles.title: MikroTik oznámil betaverzi konfiguračního nástroje WinBox verze 4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V Epic Store je možné zdarma získat Fallout Classic Collection, což je Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics.
articles.title: Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics zdarma v Epic Store

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Mirko Pavleski ze Severní Makedonie minulý týden zveřejnil návod, jak vyrobit jednoduché a levné internetové rádio s ESP32.  Použije k tomu CrowPanel 2.8"-ESP32 HMI 320×240, což je dotyková obrazovka s ESP32 v ceně asi 15 dolarů. K tomu Li-pol baterii, reproduktor a vypínač a to je všechno.
articles.title: Internetové rádio s ESP32 a Yoradio

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Před pěti lety Microsoft vydal písmo Cascadia Code pod licencí Open Font, které je určeno pro terminál nebo editory kódu. Používá jej také Windows Terminal. Nyní pokračuje s dalším vylepšováním písma a ve středu zveřejnil font Cascadia Next.
articles.title: Microsoft připravuje písmo Cascadia Next

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Nedávno vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM. Kromě menší paměti a ceny má také SoC Broadcom BCM2712 s označením D0. Ten by měl mít odstraněny nepotřebné věci.
articles.title: Nové Raspberry Pi 5 s 2 GB RAM má o 0,8–0,9 W menší spotřebu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: asdf.root)
articles.description: Polská společnost Teonite vyvinula open-source aplikaci Defguard postavenou na WireGuardu s implementací MFA/2FA včetně podpory YubiKey. Další výhodou je možnost napojení na LDAP a podpora SSO.
articles.title: Defguard: WireGuard s podporou MFA/2FA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Včera, po mírném zpoždění, vyšlo Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, včetně všech oficiálních variant Kubuntu, Ubuntu Budgie, Ubuntu MATE, Lubuntu , Ubuntu Kylin, Ubuntu Studio, Xubuntu, Edubuntu , Ubuntu Cinnamon a Ubuntu Unity. Detaily naleznete v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: Vyšlo Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, uživatelé 22.04 mohou aktualizovat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ness Czech spouští nový inovační datový hub pro střední a východní Evropu. Fortinet rozšiřuje bezpečnostní platformu pro ochranu kyberneticko-fyzikálních systémů. Umělá inteligence předvídá zločin a odhalí i ukrytou zbraň. Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat. Red Hat na podporu svých implementačních partnerů rozšířil partnerský program.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nový objev ve světě polovodičů: Vědci potvrdili existenci další modifikace uhlíku. Black Hole Moon: Máme tu další nápad, jak by mimozemské civilizace mohly čerpat energii z černých děr. Vodu v hlubinách Marsu nepřeceňovat.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Technosignatury se možná dají snadno přehlédnout

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Slevy v akci Back to School pokračují. Jedna ze stránek, která poskytuje nejlepší nabídku a je také spolehlivá, je Goodoffer24.com. Zde jsou ceny které se vymykají, zvláště pro operační systém Microsoft, a to jak pro současnou verzi, tak předchozí, a také jak pro verze Pro či Home. A dále také, s exkluzivním kódem, můžete získat další 30% slevu, abyste se mohli těšit z doživotních licencí. Nebo jinak, platíte jen jednou a můžete zapomenout na problémy.
articles.title: Slevy na Goodoffer24 Back to School až 91 %: Windows 11 jen za €20, Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 35/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Acronis představuje novou verzi Acronis True Image na českém trhu. Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %. Vědci vyvinuli metodu detekce jednoatomových defektů v polovodičích. Každá pátá firma zasažena útoky na dodavatelský řetězec hardwaru. České firmy platí po útoků ransomwarem výkupné i 6 milionů Kč.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Navrhují hledat temnou hmotu v neutronových hvězdách. Nová analýza dat z Webbova dalekohledu ukazuje, že s Hubbleovou konstantou nemusí být problém.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Nitridy uhlíku mohou konkurovat diamantu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 34/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V letních měsících byly vydány aktualizace openSUSE Leap a SUSE, FreeBSD, Debianu, na testování zabezpečení zaměřených distribucí Kali a Parrot, dále např. IPFire, EasyOS, Tails či EndeavourOS.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 23-26/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: AI působí jako katalyzátor ransomwarových útoků, ale i jako jejich brzda. Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě. Westcom 3D LAB demonstruje možnosti integrace bezpečnostních řešení více dodavatelů. Velké jazykové modely by mohly samy pro sebe generovat programy. A k čemu to může být dobré? articles.author: bkralik
articles.description:
Ač to podle počasí nevypadá, prázdniny skončily. Nesmutněte však, neboť již tento čtvrtek bude Virtuální Bastlírna - setkání elektroniků, bastlířů, ajťáků a všech milovníků techniky! Jaké novinky a témata tam čekají? Nový procesor na trhu zpravidla vzruší jen uživatele PC, největší novinka tohoto měsíce se týká spíše bastlířů. Raspberry vydalo nový procesor RP2350, který je výrazným vylepšením původního RP2040. Kromě Arm Cortex M33 jader skrývá také RISC-V jádra a značné množství zajímavých digitálních periferií. Ač oficiální desky ještě nejsou dostupné, samozřejmě se strahovákům procesor i tak dostal do rukou a možná i do hledáčku elektronových mikroskopů. A poví si i proč má nový Bus Pirate s tímto procesorem lehké trable a jaké zajímavosti se nachází v erratě procesoru.

Tím samozřejmě novinky nekončí - ještě se bastlíři zmíní o novém nativním konfiguračním nástroji pro síťové prvky od Mikrotiku a o podpoře jednovrstvých plošných spojů v Altiu. Protože jsou ale bastlíři, nezapomenou i na čistě hardwarová témata.

Ze světa hardwaru ukáží nejen novinky nebo praktické poznatky ohledně minimalistických sad nářadí, které se dají vždy nosit s sebou, ale i pár lehce "retro" projektů. Vznikla například replika klávesnice k počítači Ondra a ke starým osciloskopům se dá v současnosti koupit emulátor disketové mechaniky, který používá standardní USB flash disky.

A jak je zvykem, mají strahováci nachystaná i obskurní až bizarní témata, kupříkladu simulátor 555 na Attiny, čínské klony karet MIFARE Classic s nedokumentovaným backdoorem nebo velice osobité útržky z legendární knihy Rozeberte si PC.

Příští Virtuální Bastlírna se pod taktovkou projektu MacGyver studentského klubu SiliconHill bude konat ve čtvrtek 5. září od 20:00 minimálně do 22:00 (ale obvykle končí o dost později). Odkaz na konferenci se před samotnou akcí objeví na bastlířské wiki.
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 42: Nový mikrokontrolér od Raspberry Foundation

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Lethal Company developer Zeekerss released the Patch Notes and update for Version 64 of the popular survival game today, indicating that while the patch is a smaller one, he wanted to get it out as soon as possible because it has a couple of nice features. Here are all the details we know about about Lethal Company Version 64 and the Patch Notes for the update titled The Bag Patch.





Lethal Company Update 64 Patch Notes


Compared to previous updates, Version 64 for Lethal Company is a rather small update. However, as Zeekerss mentioned, it does have some pretty important additions such as a new item, a new rare weather event, and a ton of bug fixes. According to Zeekerss, he's been spending a lot of time working on another project, titled Welcome to the Dark Place, with hopes of finishing it soon.


The last two versions were mostly bug fixes, and so is Version 64, but with at least two new pieces of content, it's a great update for Lethal Company fans to get back into it. Here are the full Lethal Company Version 64 Patch Notes, for the update titled The Bag Patch:



New Tactical Belt Bag - The tactical belt bag can now be bought from the terminal. It holds 15 non-scrap items and can be accessed by other players while it's around your waist. Use "INFO" to learn more about it.


Rare Weather Event - A new, rare 0.6% chance weather event can now occur on any day at a random time.


Bug Fixes - A few bug fixes.



While Zeekerss didn't go into detail about the bug fixes, it's typically changes that overall improve the quality of the game by fixing the rare bug or issue that may occur when playing Lethal Company. The Version 64 update is live now on PC via Steam.

The post Lethal Company Version 64 Patch Notes – The Bag Patch appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Lethal Company Version 64 Patch Notes – The Bag Patch

As such, characters in the S Tier can compete in…

How to collect Max Particles from Power Spots in Pokémon Go

articles.author: Sourav Banik
articles.description:
Winged Keys are one of the common currencies in Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions that you can earn in several ways and they help you unlock different characters, wands, broom trails, and more.


Unlike the Firebolt, you need these Winged Keys to unlock certain iconic characters from Harry Potter movies such as Draco Malfoy and Cedric Diggory. They cost a certain amount and earning this currency is not as easy as earning Gold and Moonstones.


Fortunately, there are a handful of ways to earn Winged Keys, and here's how you can do that.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to earn Winged Keys Quidditch Champions


There are two ways of earning Winged Keys:



Complete Daily and Weekly Challenges


Reach different milestones in Seasonal events



Completing Daily challenges such as playing five PvP matches, winning a game, completing assists, or more can fetch you 2 to 3 Winged Keys. Weekly challenges on the other hand take longer to complete and reward you with 7 to 10 Winged Keys.


The current Season has several milestones and reaching at least level 50 will get you 100 Winged Keys in total. You can continue leveling up; each level beyond 50 will give you 10 of this currency.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to use Winged Keys in Quidditch Champions


Once you have enough Winged Keys stacked up, you can head to The Vault under Market to spend them on characters such as Draco Malfoy, Cedric Diggory, Ginny Weasley, and Cho Chang. They are known as the Heroes of Hogwarts and each of their bundles cost 250x Winged Keys.


These characters have their dedicated bundles in the store which also offer other items such as styled wands, house-wise goal celebrations, and colored broom trails.


Winged Keys are the enchanted Flying Keys you've read in Harry Potter: Philosopher's Stone. Just like the series, Winged Keys are equally rare to get in Quidditch Champions, and have many uses we've mentioned above.

The post How to get Winged Keys in Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Winged Keys in Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions

articles.author: Moulik Mathur
articles.description:
Carrier AI Fragment is an interactive component in No Man’s Sky, which is primarily used to detect crashed Sentinel Interceptors in the game. Players can find Carrier AI Fragment in No Man’s Sky through a variety of ways.


However, the method which guarantees Carrier AI Fragment is go after the Sentinel Capital Ships, and destroy them. A Sentinel Capital Ship is the last sentinel force sent against the player when they’re fighting sentinels in space. A Sentinel Capital Ship arrives at a level 5 wanted level. This freighter comes with regular Sentinel Interceptors to defeat the player.





You have to damage the hull of the freighter and destroy it, which will also cause nearby Sentinel Interceptors to retreat. You will receive the Carrier AI Fragment among other items as loot for defeating the Sentinel Capital Ship.


There are also other ways in No Man’s Sky where you might stumble upon a Carrier AI Fragment, but the chances are slim. Nexus missions can sometimes offer Carrier AI Fragment as reward for completing a task. You might also receive Carrier AI Fragment as loot from successful combat frigate expeditions.


Video via Hello Games


Regardless, the chances for both of these scenarios are slim, so if you are specifically looking for Carrier AI Fragment, your guaranteed way of obtaining it is by defeating the Sentinel Capital Ship.


Defeating Sentinel Interceptors, then the Sentinel Capital Ship is not as easy task to accomplish, so make sure your starship is equipped with enough shields and weapons technology upgrades to aid you well in battle. It’s best to equip a starship with maneuverability and upgrade it with technology and weapons, as large inventory ships move and turn way slower than sleek, combat ships.

The post No Man’s Sky: How to get Carrier AI Fragment appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: No Man’s Sky: How to get Carrier AI Fragment

Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 puts you into the shoes of an Ultramarine and throws you into a head-to-head war against the Tyranid scum. You'll combat Xenos in PvE game modes and other players in PvP, and you can look damn good while doing it with the game's Twitch Drops. 


You might not expect to have a huge variety of customization options for your character in Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2, but it fits the universe incredibly well. Think about it. Warhammer 40K is a tabletop game that's just as much about customizing your miniatures as it is about actually playing against others using the armies you've made. You can do something similar with this game's Twitch Drops, but you need to be set up to earn them first. 


How to get Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 Twitch Drops

articles.title: How to get Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 Twitch Drops

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Sprayfeather Gill in Genshin Impact is an ascension item that can help Mualani level up. It's a beautiful Natlan flower that can be picked up throughout the African-inspired nation. 


Sprayfeather Gill Genshin Impact location


You'll find the majority of the Sprayfeather Gills in Genshin Impact by visiting the Ameyalco Waters area in Natlan. It's in the northern section of the Toyac Springs region.


Screenshot via Appsample


The Sprayfeather Gill grows near the water. Look at the shrubs and rocks within this area, and you'll spot the blue and orange plant that's, in fact, taller than Bennett. 


How many Sprayfeather Gills do you need to ascend Mualani?


To ascend Mualani to her max level, you'll require 168 Sprayfeather Gill. Additionally, you'll need a grand total of 46 Mark of the Binding Blessing that can be gained by taking down the Holawaqa Ngoubou boss. 420,000 Mora is also needed to get to her maximum level, which can be gained in multiple ways.


Screenshot by Destructoid


To get Mora in Genshin Impact, you can use promo codes, redeem a special PlayStation Plus-exclusive pack, finish quests, and have characters complete expeditions with the Adventurer's Guild. You can also get your Daily Commission Rewards finished. 


You'll also need the following materials to fully level up Mualani:



1 Varunda Lazurite Sliver


9 Varunda Lazurite Chunk


9 Varunda Lazurite Fragment


6 Varunda Lazurite Gemstone


18 Sentry's Wooden Whistle


36 Saurian-Crowned Warrior's Golden Whistle


30 Warrior's Metal Whistle



The whistles drop from many different Saurian-Crowned Warriors across Natlan. Varunda Lazurite materials can be gathered from a bunch of different bosses, such as the Hydro Hypostasis from Inazuma and Rhodeia of Loch from Liyue

The post Where to find Sprayfeather Gill in Genshin Impact appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find Sprayfeather Gill in Genshin Impact

This might be short notice, but Frontier Developments just announced that, as of September 6, 2024, the Planet Coaster: Ghostbusters DLC will be delisted from storefronts. The DLC first came out in 2019. As it is licensed content from the movie, its days were always numbered, and it looks like those days amounted to (a bit over) five years. Still, a little more notice would have been appreciated.


The Ghostbusters DLC features decorations and rides based on the film franchise. The Ghostbusters Experience ride also includes a sort of interactive mini-game. There’s also a “narrative” campaign featuring the voice of Dan Aykroyd and William Atherton (Who? Oh, Peck!). It was praised as being a fairly robust expansion, whereas other licensed DLC for the game were more cosmetic.




I didn’t get…
articles.title: Heads up: the Ghostbusters DLC for Planet Coaster is about to be delisted

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Once you enter the endgame of Black Myth: Wukong, you might want to pay attention to the Bull King Iron Horn resource. Getting one of the better sets in the game will be important. 


Here’s what you need to know about the item and how to get it.


How to get the Bull King Iron Horn in Black Myth: Wukong


To get the Bull King Iron Horn in Black Myth: Wukong, you have to beat the boss, Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast, in the secret area of Chapter 5. This area can be accessed in this chapter while doing the Pale-Axe Stalwart’s quest.


Once you can start crafting Mythical level gear, you’ll see that this item will be necessary for crafting the Bull King’s set, which grants you the Unyielding Resolve set bonus.


It should be noted that you can only obtain four units of this resource per story playthrough. If you want to craft the whole set, you need to go into New Game Plus and defeat the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast again. 


At most, you can only craft three of the four pieces of the set in one run. However, there are incentives to run the game again as you’ll unlock additional gear to use in the second playthrough.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Additional uses for the Bull King Iron Horn


Not only will you be able to get an additional four units of this crafting item, but you’ll also unlock the Dark Iron Staff. This Mythical weapon comes from the Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff upgrade tree and will also require the Bull King Iron Horn. 


While not directly part of the set, its unique effect coincides with the armor’s stats. It’ll “considerably” increase your damage based on how much defense you have. So, with the high defense stat the Bull King set has, this weapon is the perfect match for it. 


Now with a full set and potentially the staff to go with it, you can take on the next level of New Game Plus and see how strong this setup can get.

The post How to get the Bull King Iron Horn in Black Myth: Wukong appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get the Bull King Iron Horn in Black Myth: Wukong

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Normally, as you're playing Fortnite, you want to avoid taking damage and eliminate others to get a victory royale. However, finishing quests occasionally requires inflicting and taking damage from specific sources. Let's find out where you can find some fire.


Where to find fire in Fortnite


The easiest way to create a fire is by visiting any gas station and blowing up the gas pumps. While you'd typically use gas pumps to refuel your car, letting them explode causes fire on the ground, allowing you to step in it and take damage for your quests.


Screenshot by Destructoid


You'll find gas stations all around Fortnite, particularly surrounding major POIs. My go-to is one directly southwest of Doomstadt, but it'll mostly depend on personal preference and the circumstances of your current match.


Just be careful while doing this, as the explosion will cause a significant amount of damage to your character. Gather some shields beforehand and keep your health high to make sure you don't eliminate yourself during this process. You can damage gas pumps using guns to maintain a safe distance from the blast or use a pickaxe and quickly run away if you have no other options.


A fire will appear on the ground once you cause a gas pump to explode. Stepping in this will damage you, completing any quests related to it. Like before, you'll want to make sure you have high health and shields so the fire doesn't kill you instantly. It doesn't do a ton of damage, but it can still give you a disadvantage against any incoming players.

The post How to take and survive fire damage in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 4 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to take and survive fire damage in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 4

articles.author: Jonathan LoChiatto
articles.description:
Some recent Destiny rumors have been corroborated by reputable industry sources that allege a mobile entry for the franchise, reportedly called Destiny Rising, is currently being worked on by Chinese developer NetEase. While details on the project remain scarce, prominent insiders like Jeff Grubb have commented on its existence and seemingly confirmed that it's still being worked on.


This news comes in the wake of some turmoil at Bungie. At the end of July, the company had its second round of layoffs within a year, with additional employees getting integrated into Sony. Since then, conversations about the studio's mismanagement have coalesced alongside high-ranking departures and scandals.


Previous reporting from Bloomberg and Forbes indicated that a Destiny mobile game may have been among the projects canceled alongside project Payback. However, more recently, The Game Post reported that notable insider Kurakasis posted on X, formerly Twitter, saying, "Destiny Rising is the title of an unannounced Destiny mobile game being developed by NetEase and Bungie[.] It has not been canceled."


The info was seemingly backed up by another insider, Jeff Grubb, who made a comment about the post on Threads. Grubb wrote, "Yeah, this is real. Not a lot of people from Bungie working on it. It could get announced soon." When pressed for further details in the comments, Grubb talked about gameplay, saying, "It's going to be Destiny on mobile, but with a lot of changes. Hero characters instead of building your own character, for example."


While this new information comes from reputable sources in the industry, it should be taken with a grain of salt. Bungie has not announced Destiny Rising or any Destiny mobile project in any official capacity, and plans can always change.

The post A NetEase-made Destiny mobile game is allegedly in development appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A NetEase-made Destiny mobile game is allegedly in development

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Thundering Fury is a powerful item in Type Soul (in Roblox) that can imbue your character with electricity and enable some powerful attacks. Its use is pretty simple, but how to get it is less straightforward.


Where to get Thundering Fury in Type Soul


To get Thundering Fury in Type Soul you’re going to need to go to AFK World. I have heard at least one other person say they got it as a Clan Wars review, but the only place I know of from my experience is AFK World.


However, to get to AFK World you need to get a World Ticket. That is totally something you can get from Clan Wars. World Tickets can also be bought, redeemed from a code, or won in ranked matches. Once you use a World Ticket the AFK World option will unlock on the main menu, and you can enter.


AFK World rewards you for… being AFK. Away-from-keyboard, that is. As you wait, every so often (every hour, it seems), it will drop a random item for you. You can increase this by winning PVP battles, which increases your Soulian Streak. The higher your Soulian Streak, the higher the drop rate. However, anyone can attack you once you enter the PVP arena, so if you want to maintain it you need to either hide or protect yourself, which kind of defeats the purpose of AFK World, but I digress.


Wait around long enough, and you may come into possession of Thundering Fury. It’s a very rare drop, so you may have to leave your game running for quite a long time.


How to use Thundering Fury in Type Soul


Using Thundering Fury in Type Soul is pretty straightforward. You set it to one of your quick key slots, then activate it. Your character will erupt into an aura of lightning, signifying it’s active. The item isn’t used up upon activation.

The post How to get and use Thundering Fury in Type Soul appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get and use Thundering Fury in Type Soul

articles.title: NBA 2K25 difficulty modes explained

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
There are a series of quest chains in Hallowfall that result in you receiving a Wooden Figure, an object with no easily discernible use or purpose. However, it's actually used as part of another quest, and ultimately part of the Lost and Found achievement. Here is where to find and turn in the Wooden Figure in WoW The War Within.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to get the Wooden Figure


You will receive the Wooden Figure item as a quest reward for completing the Time Borrowed quest from Maera Ashyld in Hallowfall. In fact, she will give you three items: a Calcified Journal, a Wooden Figure, and a Sturdy Locket. All of these items pertain to various local quests that will earn you the Lost and Found achievement.


In order to pick up the Time Borrowed quest, you will need to complete the Memories of the Sky quest chain with Maera Ashyld, which is unfortunately locked behind two weekly reset timegates. This means the first time you can actually pick up and do the Time Borrowed quest is on September 3, 2024, as long as you have been completing all the previous quests each week you can.


Next, you need to get 6 Mementos for Maera by farming the mobs around the area. Once you've gotten all 6, turn them into Marea who lets you keep three, including the Wooden Figure.


Where to turn in the Wooden Figure in The War Within


Now that you've got your hands on the Wooden Figure, you can use it to get the quest properly titled, well, Wooden Figure. You must then take the Wooden Figure to the NPC Barahl Lynflayme, located in the area called Dunelle's Kindness in Hallowfall.


Handing it over to Barahl will complete the quest and earn you progress toward the Lost and Found achievement. If this was the last step of the achievement for you, you will also receive the Sandy Quotidian Wear cosmetic ensemble appearance for completing the achievement.

The post Where to find and turn in the Wooden Figure in WoW The War Within appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find and turn in the Wooden Figure in WoW The War Within

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
The Silent Hill 2 PC system requirements are pretty beefy, and for a seemingly gorgeous horror game like this, it makes sense. Publisher Konami recommends that you have an SSD and at least 16GB of RAM for both minimum and recommended specs lists.


Image via Konami


Silent Hill 2 PC minimum system requirements


Silent Hill 2 will be pushing some impressive current-gen visuals on your PC. This means you'll need the following specs to play the game on Low or Medium settings at 1080p, according to Silent Hill 2's Steam listing.



OS: Windows 10 x64


Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600


Memory: 16 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 Ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700


DirectX: Version 12


Storage: 50 GB available space



These specs will also have you running Silent Hill 2 at 30 frames per second at Low or Medium. With this in mind, it may be time for you to upgrade your computer's specs before trying to play this horror remake. Is this spooking you to go to Best Buy or Amazon right now? Thankfully, you won't need as much storage as games like Starfield (125GB) and Horizon: Forbidden West (150GB).  


Image via Konami


Silent Hill 2 recommended specs


To play the game at 1080p (or up-rezzed 4K with DLSS) on Medium settings (with 60 FPS) or High settings (with 30 FPS), you'll need the following:



OS: Windows 10 x64


Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X


Memory: 16 GB RAM


Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 2080RTX or AMD Radeon™ 6800XT


DirectX: Version 12


Storage: 50 GB available space



Hopefully, the way to play Silent Hill 2 on your PC won't be too foggy, but at least the high end settings aren't as bad as they could be, considering some of the demands of other current-gen games out there. 

The post Silent Hill 2 PC system requirements – minimum and recommended appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Silent Hill 2 PC system requirements – minimum and recommended

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Cole Palmer Make Your Mark item is one of the most fun cards I have played with in EA FC 24. Not everyone scored the card back at its debut, but now you've got a second chance to recruit Palmer for yourself. 


I was thrilled to get the card when it was released as part of the Make Your Mark promo back in Season 7. If you didn't have that same luck, Season 9 has some good news for free. You can unlock this card, and the Ferland Mendy Make Your Mark, for free by completing the latest objective set. 


EA FC 24 Pre-Season Draft Play objective rewards


The Pre-Season Draft Play objective revolves around the Draft mode of EA FC 24. You'll need to spend FC Points, coins, or Draft tokens to play. You can obtain a unique token on a daily basis in Ultimate Team. Use them to complete all the objectives, adding two special cards to your squad. 



Play 1: Play 1 match in any Ultimate Team game mode.


Play 1 Draft: Play 1 Ultimate Team Draft match.


Play 2 Draft: Play 2 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Play 4 Draft: Play 4 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Play 6 Draft: Play 6 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Play 10 Draft: Play 10 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Win 3 Draft: Win 3 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Win 5 Draft: Win 5 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Win 8 Draft: Win 8 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Win 3 Online: Win 3 Ultimate Team Draft matches.


Win 8 Online: Win 8 Ultimate Team Draft matches.



Here's what you need to get the two Make Your Mark cards that are part of this objective set in EA FC 24. 



Ferland Mendy: Play 10 Ultimate Team Draft Matches. 


Cole Palmer: Complete all 11 tasks as it's the group reward. 



It's pretty easy to complete the objectives, and you won't even have to spend any coins. Both cards can do well even in this endgame season, and the grind is certainly worth your efforts. 

The post EA FC 24: How to get Cole Palmer Make Your Mark for free appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 24: How to get Cole Palmer Make Your Mark for free

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The spectacular demise of Fmovies, Aniwave, and a dozen or more related big-brand pirate sites, has former users asking the same question: Are they really gone forever? With many resurrections and Dr. Who-like regenerations over recent years, some seem optimistic. Government records suggests that business bridges are being built from Hollywood to Vietnam, and back again. It seems unlikely that the resurrection of pirate sites would help in any way.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies & Aniwave: Will The Masters of Pirate Resurrection Rise Again?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy once again confuses users with a mysterious message. Instead of the usual list of downloads, it simply shows an image from the film Logan and the brief message "TG Forever". This is similar to a notice that appeared on the site a few weeks ago, after which it eventually resumed business as usual. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Spooks Users with More ‘Downtime’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this month, U.S. law enforcement seized several domain names belonging to popular sports streaming site Streameast. However, instead of shutting down operations, the site is fighting back. After launching new backup domains, the site's operators inform TorrentFreak that they plan to challenge the seizure warrant in court.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sports Streaming Site Streameast Plans to Appeal U.S. Domain Name Seizures

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Despite malware having an even worse reputation than piracy, until now police operations to take sites down, explicitly because they're involved in both, have been pretty much non-existent. This week, music industry group IFPI revealed Operation Redirect, "the first operation of its kind in Brazil to target illegal sites associated with malware distribution." Intrigued by the announcement, we took a closer look and found plenty of drama.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation Redirect: Police Anti-Malware Action Protects Music & Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Fmovies, one of the most popular pirate streaming sites of recent times, disappeared a few weeks ago. No credit was taken by authorities or rightsholders, not even when related giants including AniWave fell this week. Today, initial suspicions are confirmed; anti-piracy group ACE says it assisted Vietnamese authorities to shut down the piracy ring. In parallel, the Vietnamese Government is organizing a promo tour in Hollywood.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies Piracy Ring Was Shut Down by Vietnam, Assisted By ACE

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit, filed in June by the world's largest educational publishers, accused Google of promoting pirate sites and profiting from piracy, among other things. This week Google responded to the Cengage Learning-led complaint with a motion to dismiss all but one of the publishers' claims, describing them as "tacked on" as part of a "kitchen-sink pleading strategy."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Asks Court to Gut “Kitchen Sink” Lawsuit Claiming it Profits From Piracy

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Fmovies was once the world's most popular pirate streaming site. Then mid-June, after years of smooth sailing, it vanished into thin air. Sites with over a billion annual visits tend not to throw everything away so easily. Yet last night, a site with close to two billion visits disappeared in similar circumstances, rapidly followed by another, and then many others after that. In the absence of an official announcement, earlier today we took an early sift through the wreckage.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Sites, Billions of Visits, Wiped Out in Hours: Sifting the Fmovies Wreckage

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After the recent shutdown of Fmovies, right now an entire streaming empire is collapsing. Big name casualties include Fboxz.to, Aniwave.to, Anix.to, AnimeSuge, Zoroxtv, the list goes on. In a message displayed on their homepages, visitors are advised to use legal options from now on. The exact same message appeared when 123movies threw in the towel a few years ago. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Streaming Giants Fboxz, AniWave, Zoroxtv & Others Dead in Major Collapse

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Claims that Italy will launch Piracy Shield 2.0 at the end of the year appear to be overly optimistic. With just four months left of 2024, a software supplier hasn't even been chosen yet. With the current system falling over, previously blocked domains and IP addresses are being unblocked to make room for new ones, something that the law has no provision for. Meanwhile, smart TV manufacturers will soon be asked to ban a VPN app from their sets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield 2.0 in Doubt For 2024 , TV Manufacturers Urged to Ban VPN

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Do you know someone who sells dodgy streaming boxes or pirate IPTV streams? In Ireland, anti-piracy group FACT in partnership with Crimestoppers would like you to 'report' this activity. These 'snitch' initiatives are not widely embraced by the public but with a six-week social media push, the campaign aims to identity new enforcement targets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pssst… Want to Snitch on Sellers of Pirate Streaming Services?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
"House of the Dragon" is one of the most watched TV series, particularly among pirates. The second season ended earlier this month after the eighth episode, though many fans had hoped for more. Pirates who downloaded the unexpected 'House of the Dragon S02E09' release got a surprise bonus, but not the one they were hoping for. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Bonus’ Episode of ‘House of the Dragon’ Comes With a Nasty Surprise for Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular pirate streaming site Fmovies shut down this summer, with several sister sites following suit. These sites were redirected to new streaming portals, purportedly operated by different individuals. This caught the attention of anti-piracy group ACE, which obtained a DMCA subpoena this week to unmask the people behind these new sites.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Goes After Fmovies Sister Site ‘Successors’

For details of bugs fixed in each previous release of Android Studio Ladybug, see

Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.
